Content.Text:
Q. What are templates and why do I need them?
A. Templates are needed because...
  • Templates are the skeletal structures of surveys.
  • Multiple surveys can be created from a single template.
    • These multiple surveys can have minor differences in the specifics of the surveys. These differences occur when the template author creates a tag item that would have different answers depending on the survey being sent. Basically a tag item is something that is left undefined at the template level prompting the survey creator to provide additional information but requires an answer before a survey can be sent.
    • For example, a tag item of “Building” would be in a survey template that requires that the survey be building-specific. In this case, the survey creator would provide the particular building that each survey applies to when creating surveys.
  • Because Human Subjects Research and the Authorized Derivative Classifier must review and approve surveys prior to publication, using an approved template eliminates the need for approval of every survey based on that template.
  • Using a template saves time when generating surveys that are similar to each other.
  • Survey Administration Tool FAQ introduction.
  • What is the purpose of the Survey Administration tool?
  • What is the difference between delegates, owners, and users of my surveys and templates?
  • What happens when I give users user permissions for my template?
  • Can I see other surveys created by other users from my template?
  • When I preview the survey, I see mark-up text where page breaks would normally be and little clickable “Look” icons. Is this what the survey recipients will see?
  • What are survey groups?
  • Why do I have to “request publication?”
  • I am getting a message that says that the template is approved but the Request Publication button for my template has disappeared and I can’t send it to anyone yet. Why not?
  • Why can’t I change the template/survey I’ve used before?
  • Why can’t I delete a template or survey I no longer need?
  • What does the Reporting feature do?
  • Why do the pages expire sometimes when I use the back button?
  • Some of the menu items are not clickable. Why not?
